TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Attachment extends System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase

span.span: Represents an attachment to an email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會搭配類別。The class is used with the class. 所有的訊息包括，其中包含訊息的內容。All messages include a , which contains the content of the message. 除了本文中，您可能想要將其他檔案傳送。In addition to the body, you might want to send additional files. 這些會當成附件來傳送，並表示為執行個體。These are sent as attachments and are represented as instances. 若要新增的電子郵件訊息的附件，將它加入集合。To add an attachment to a mail message, add it to the collection. 附件內容可以是， ，或檔案名稱。Attachment content can be a , , or file name. 您也可以使用的任何附件中指定內容建構函式。You can specify the content in an attachment by using any of the constructors. 附件的 MIME 內容類型標頭資訊由屬性。The MIME Content-Type header information for the attachment is represented by the property. Content-type 標頭指定的媒體類型和子型別以及任何相關聯的參數。The Content-Type header specifies the media type and subtype and any associated parameters. 使用取得附件相關聯的執行個體。Use to get the instance associated with an attachment. MIME 內容配置標頭由屬性。The MIME Content-Disposition header is represented by the property. 內容配置標頭會指定在展示層和附件的檔案時間戳記。The Content-Disposition header specifies the presentation and file time stamps for an attachment. 附件是一個檔案時，才傳送的內容配置標頭。A Content-Disposition header is sent only if the attachment is a file. 使用取得附件相關聯的執行個體的屬性。Use the property to get the instance associated with an attachment. MIME 內容傳遞編碼標頭由屬性。The MIME Content-Transfer-Encoding header is represented by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將檔案附加到電子郵件訊息。The following code example demonstrates attaching a file to an email message. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的資訊類別表示的 MIME 內容配置標頭。The information in the class represents the MIME Content-Disposition header. 此標頭所述 RFC 2183，網址[ https://www.ietf.org/ ](https://www.ietf.org/)。This header is described in RFC 2183, available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得附件，並顯示其屬性。The following code example gets the for an attachment and displays its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果內容是以 ASCII 格式則的字元編碼會設定為 ASCII。If the content is in ASCII format then the character encoding is set to ASCII. 針對其他所有格式，字元編碼方式是設定為 utf-8。For all other formats, the character encoding is set to utf-8. 預設媒體類型是純文字。The default media type is plain text. 如果內容不是以 ASCII 格式編碼為 null，會使用 utf-8 編碼。If the content is not in ASCII format and the encoding is null, utf-8 encoding is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 產生這個附件的內容類型標頭中使用的屬性。The property is used in the Content-Type header generated for this attachment. 收到有附件的電子郵件時，會顯示為附件的名稱。The is displayed as the attachment's name when the email with the attachment is received. 詳細說明 Content-type 標頭語法的文法是在 RFC 2045 5.1 節中所述。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供有關 MIME 媒體類型和其參數的詳細的資訊。RFC 2046 provides detailed information about MIME media types and their parameters. 這些 Rfc 位於[ https://www.ietf.org/ ](https://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示附件的相關資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to display information about an attachment.
